contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Xiphopteris'' | regnum = [[Plant]]ae | unranked_divisio = [[Monilophyta]] | classis = [[Polypodiopsida]] | ordo = [[Polypodiales]] | familia = [[Polypodiaceae]] | genus = '''''Xiphopteris''''' | genus_authority = [[Georg Friedrich Kaulfuss| G.F. Kaulfuss]] | type_species = ''[[Xiphopteris serrulata]]'' | type_species_authority = [[Olof Swartz| (O.P. Swartz]]) G.F. Kaulfuss | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = see text }} '''''Xiphopteris''''' is a [[Obsolescence|defunct]] [[genus]] of [[fern]]s in the [[Family (biology)| family]] [[Polypodiaceae]]. The [[Scientific name| name]] is [[Etymology|derived]] from two [[Greek language| Greek]] words: ''xiphos'', "sword", and ''pteris'', "fern".<ref name="quattrocchiIV"> Umberto Quattrocchi. 2000. ''CRC World Dictionary of Plant Names''. volume IV. CRC Press: Baton Rouge, New York, London, Washington DC. ISBN 978-0-8493-2677-6. </ref> The [[Genus #Generic name| name]] "''Xiphopteris''" can no longer be used because its [[type species]], ''Xiphopteris serrulata'' has been transferred to ''[[Cochlidium]]''.<ref name="parris2009">Barbara S. Parris. 2009. "New genera of Malesian Grammitidaceae". ''Blumea'' '''54'''(1-3):217-219. {{doi|10.3767/000651909X476184}}</ref> Because ''Xiphopteris'' is [[polyphyletic]], some of its [[species]] were not transferred to ''Cochlidium'' with the type species. For these, the name ''Xiphopteris'' has been used provisionally, pending their reassignment to other genera.<ref name="sundue2010">Michael A. Sundue, Melissa Islam, and Tom A. Ranker. In press. ''Systematic Botany''.</ref> ''[[Xiphopteris ascensionense]]'', ([[Georg Hans Emmo Wolfgang Hieronymus|Hieronymus]]) [[Quentin C.B. Cronk| Cronk]] is an example of this provisional usage. == References == {{Reflist}} [[Category:Xiphopteris| ]]
